resources.string: Go Vote, online voting system is Android application used to securely conduct votes and elections. As a digital platform, they eliminate the need to cast your votes using paper or having to gather in person.
Our System Make the use of Firebase as backend, for login, registration and for storage purpose which make our system highly secured and reliable.
It also uses Firebase ML kit for face detection which allows us to vote, one person at a time.
This application also verify biometric with the help of finger print sensor.
Before register your vote, create an account.
Do not have an account? Register first
Your ID number will not disclose, Its just for verification purpose.
Place your face in middle of screen and then click on button and hold for a second
Now you can participate in the election easily!

Admin can control the timings of candidate registration and election
